rss.channel:
NEMO
Software updates from the NEMO package are summarized here. The full description is on the NEMO whatsnew page on https://teuben.github.io/nemo/whatsnew.html
https://teuben.github.io/nemo/rss.xml
nemo_4_1_7
(12-apr-2020) This is a pre-release of NEMO V4.2, a.k.a. the Corona release, as we all work from home. Fixed the nemo_start python module for the falcON tools.
https://teuben.github.io/nemo/whatsnew.html#4_2_0
nemo_4_1_6
(27-mar-2020) This is a pre-release of NEMO V4.2, a.k.a. the Corona release, as we all work from home.
https://teuben.github.io/nemo/whatsnew.html#4_2_0
nemo_4_1_0
(10-dec-2010 a.k.a. the IAS release) many small fixes, improved installation script. csh and sh friendly.
https://teuben.github.io/nemo/whatsnew.html#4_1_0
nemo_4_0_0
(1-jan-2018 a.k.a. the ESO release) Moved NEMO from CVS to GIT - hosted on GITHUB.
https://teuben.github.io/nemo/whatsnew.html#4_0_0
V3.3.1 orbintv
(15-may-2011) orbintv : variable order timestep orbit integrator, based on two new functions.
http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_3_1
V3.3.1 glnemo2
(3-may-2011) version 1.20 of glnemo2 released - major release.
http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_3_1
V3.3.1 glnemo2
(24-feb-2011) version 1.11 of glnemo2 released
http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_3_1
V3.3.1 snaps2plot
(14-feb-2011) snaps2plot , snapplot using s2plot "3d" library
http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_3_1
V3.3.1 earlier patches
(8-feb-2011) ccdhist (new)
(13-feb-2011) velmap (new) and velfit (updated)
24-nov-2010) improved version of UNSIO (also handling NEMO style pipe), including some new tools in the UNS_PROJECT, such as uns_2dplot Compiling and linking does require a few extra tools and libraries, such as cmake, sqlite.
24-may-2010) some more adjustments in the default gfortran scheme
http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_3_1
3_3_0
3_3_0 (a.k.a. the Leiden Release) was released 22 May 2010
http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_3_0
3_2_5
3_2_5 was released 10 September 2008
http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_2_5
3_2_4
3_2_4 (a.k.a. the Puebla release) was released 5 August 2006
http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_2_4

http://www.astro.umd.edu/nemo/whatsnew.html#3_2_3
3_2_2

24 January 1994
